characters: Bluey Heeler, Bingo Heeler, Bandit Heeler, Chilli Heeler
plot: Join Bluey for a fun day at the beach. What will you discover along the way? While Mum is off for a walk along the beach, Bluey discovers a beautiful shell. She runs to show Mum and has a series of encounters that will both excite and test her in unexpected ways.
trivia: It was one of the first books based on a Bluey episode with the same name along with 'Fruit Bat' which came out the same day. The book is a Lift-The-Flap type. Although Surfer is in the episode, she is not in the book.

characters: Bluey Heeler, Bingo Heeler, Bandit Heeler, Chilli Heeler
plot: Join Bluey and Bingo as they play a game of Fruit Bat, where they learn about teamwork and imagination.
trivia: This book is also based on an episode of the same name and emphasizes the importance of family and play.

trivia: Encourages creativity and imagination in play.

plot: Have you seen Bluey and Bingo? There are lots of other hidden items too, so join the fun in this search-and-find book!
trivia: The book is similar to the Where's Wally/Waldo series of books. Various characters appear together in the book despite never having appeared together in the series, such as Jean-Luc and Winnie.
